select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from PMS_SKU_STOCK
order by ${orderByClause}

select
from PMS_SKU_STOCK where PRODUCT_ID = #{productId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} order by PRODUCT_PRICE asc
select PRODUCT_SKU_ID, PRODUCT_SP_DATA from PMS_SKU_STOCK where PRODUCT_ID = #{productId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

where PRODUCT_SKU_ID = #{productSkuId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
